job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtResponsibilitiesltpgtltpgtThe Embedded System Engineer is responsible for developing on or deploying different test environments and capabilities on the platforms They will develop and integrate tests They will also need to be able to design and execute experiments to triage issuesltpgtltpgtMinimum QualificationsltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree in Engineering Information Systems Computer Science or related fieldltligtltligt1 years Experience with Embedded Systemltligtltligt1 years Software Engineering or related work experienceltligtltligt1 years experience with Programming Language such as C C Java Python etcltligtltligtFamiliarity with debugging via JTAG interfaceltligtltligtHandson Knowledge of Linux installation configuration and usage distrosltligtltligtKnowledge of Data center Servers Storage solutions and PeripheralsltligtltligtAbility to use oscilloscopes and logic analyzersltligtltligtExperience with SOC architecture design  verification or validationltligtltligtStrong Familiarity with Androidltligtltulgt
